entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 March 2023
